welcome_description.work: Bimisa misala na yo ya ndenge nionso (buku, Zulunalo to Karte ya mokili) mpo ete bato nyonso bákoka komona yango, mpe solola na ba oyo basali abonemá ya misala na yo.
welcome_description.establishment: Komisa etablisséman na yo (école, université, to mosusu), solola na balakisi to bayekoli, mpe kabola ba programmes mpe ba événements na yo.
welcome_description.government: Komisa institution ya gouvernement na yo (ministère, entreprise publique, to mosusu) po okoka kokabola ba événements na yo, pe okoka kosolola na public.

privacy_title: Politiki ya kobatela makambo ya moto ye moko
terms_accept1: Na kosala compte na yo, ondimi na biso
terms_accept1_: Na kosala abonnément, ondimi na biso

circle.description: Ba lisanga ya masolo esungaka yo o solola na ba membres ebele na mbala moko.

error_message.login_before_operation: Esengeli liboso omi identifier mpo na kosala opération oyo.
error_message.pending_after_payment: Tango okofuta, abonnément na yo ekozala validé na ba ngonga elandi.
error_message.no_server_response: Eyano moko te ezwami uta na serveur.
error_message.cannot_switch_like: Incapable ya ko bongola like na yo. Meká lisusu.

empty_list.title: Liste ezali pamba
empty_list.description_cart: Obakisi nanu eloko te na kitunga na yo.
empty_list.description_comments_event: Awa okomona ba commentaires pona oyo etali événement.
empty_list.description_unpaid_consultation: Awa ekolakisama misala oyo ofuti naino te mpo na kotala.
empty_list.description_unpaid_subscription: Ozali nanu na abonnement o commander te.
empty_list.description_subscribers: Awa okomona bato oyo bafutaki mpo na kotala misala na yo.
empty_list.description_subscriptions: Awa okomona misala oyo ofuti pona kotala mpe ba abonnéma oyo o commander.
empty_list.description_chat_user: Awa okomona ba membres oyo okoki ko solola na bango.
empty_list.description_chat_circle: Awa ekomona ba cercles ya chat na yo na ba membres misusu.
empty_list.description_chat_organization: Awa ekomona ba échanges na yo na ba etablisséman mpe/to ba institutions.
empty_list.description_chat_event: Awa ekolakisama ba échanges na yo na ba événements oyo babengi yo.
empty_list.description_subscription: Awa ekolakisama ba abonnéments oyo okoki kobakisa na kitunga na yo.
empty_list.description_news: Awa, ba sango etali ba organisations (etablisséman to institution ya gouvernement) oyo ezali na plateforme ekolakisama.
empty_list.description_popular: Awa, misala oyo ba membres ba consulté mingi ekolakisama.
empty_list.description_books: Awa, misala mikolakisama miye mikoki kozala consulte na ba membres.
empty_list.description_mags: Awa, eko lakisama ba journals, ba journaux to ba magazines oyo ba membres bakoki ko consulte.
empty_list.description_medias: Awa, eko lakisama ba médias oyo ba membres bakoki ko consulte.
empty_list.description_favoris: Ba médias oyo olingaka mingi ekolakisama awa po otanga tango nionso olingi.
empty_list.description_maps: Awa, eko lakisama ba cartes géographiques oyo ba membres bakoki ko consulte.
empty_list.description_user_works: Membre oyo a publier nanu mosala moko te.
empty_list.description_user_circles: Membre oyo azali na kati ya cercle moko te ya masolo.
empty_list.description_user_consultations: Membre oyo afuti nanu te pona kotala mosala moko.
empty_list.description_establishments: Awa, ba etablisséman oyo ba membres bazali na yango ekolakisama.
empty_list.description_establishment_programs: Etablisséman oyo ebimisi nanu programme te.
empty_list.description_establishment_events: Etablisséman oyo ebimisi nanu milulu te.
empty_list.description_establishment_books: Etablisséman oyo ebimisi nanu buku te.
empty_list.description_establishment_teach: Ba cours en ligne ezali nanu te pona etablisséman oyo.
empty_list.description_governments: Awa, ba institution oyo ba membres bazali na yango ekolakisama.
empty_list.description_government_events: Institution oyo ebimisi nanu milulu te.

work.title: Makambo etali mosala
work.publishing_info: Tokolandela mosala na yo liboso ete emonana na plateforme mobimba.
work.author: Mokeli

is_public.title: Kotala efutamaka
is_public.description: Pona ba medias, kotala ekosɛnga 2$, mpe pona ba lolenge mosusu ya misala ekosɛnga 1$. Boongo ezali na lotomo ya 20% ya mbongo moko na moko ya kotala.

work.max_files: Limite ya {{ count }} fichiers ekoki. Ba fichiers misusu ekoti te.

event.participate_before_comment: Esengeli o participer na événement avant o commenter.

most_popular: Oyo eza na lupemba ya makasi
search_filter_description: Na bouton vert okoki ko filtrer ba résultats na yo.

data.title: Bakisa kelasi to pe promotion pona mbula oyo ya kotanga ({{ course_year }})

personal_infos: Ba sango ya moto ye moko

activation.title: Activer abonnément na nzela ya code
activation.description: Moko ya ba partenaires na biso akokaki kopesa yo code ya kosalela mbala moko pona ko activer abonnément.

partner.label: Partenaire
partner.description: Nani nde apesaki yo code na yo ?

subscription.title: Bakisa ba abonnéments na kitunga na yo
subscription.info: Ozali na abonnément te. Banda ko s’abonner po otala.

consultation.info: Kotala mosala oyo eza ofele te, ndenge okoki komona yango.

mobile_money.label: Mobile money
mobile_money.title: Kofuta na mobile money
mobile_money.descrciption: Pona opérateur na yo mpe tia nimero ya telefone oyo esangisi yango.
mobile_money.submitted: Svp confirmer transaction na yo pe cliquez bouton oyo ezali awa na se

bank_card.label: Carte ya bank
bank_card.title: Kofuta na nzela ya karte ya kredi
bank_card.descrciption: Tyá makambo ya karte na yo ya bank.

establishment.title: Etablisséman
establishment.publishing_info: Établissement na yo ekomonana na batu nioso kaka sima ya kondimama na administrateur ya plateforme.

government.title: Ba institutions
government.publishing_info: Institution na yo ekomonana na batu nioso kaka sima ya kondimama na administrateur ya plateforme.

update_account.title: Bongola compte
update_account.description: Ba informations oyo etali compte na yo. Okoki kozwa archive ya ba données personnelles na yo.

privacy_and_safety.title: Nkuku pe bobateli makambu
privacy_and_safety.description: Landela kokota na compte na yo pe visibilité na yo (ya ba informations na yo) na misu ya ba membres misusu.

blocked_accounts.title: Ba membres o kanga
blocked_accounts.description: Lakisa ba membres nionso oyo o bloqué.

close_account.title: Bokangi ya compte
close_account.description: Compte na yo ekoki kozonga na mikolo 30. Sala makasi obomba ba données personnelles na yo avant ya kokanga compte na yo.
close_account.save_perso_data: Na bomba ba données personnelles na nga

phone_code.title: Code ya téléphone ya mboka na yo
phone_code.label: Code tél.

username.label: Pseudo
username.message: Ezali na ntina mingi mpo na masolo

auth.login_username: E-mail, n° de téléphone ou pseudo

password.label: Mot de passe
password.error: Le mot de passe est incorrect
password.reset_message: Okoki kotinda nimero nayo ya telefone mpo ete tokoka kobongola mot de passe na yo oyo tokotindela yo na nzela ya SMS mpe/to WhatsApp.

disabled.title: Compte désactivé
disabled.description: Osili ko désactiver compte na yo. Svp zongisa reactiver yango pona kosala ba opérations spécifiques.

blocked.title: Compte ekangami
blocked.description: Compte na yo ekangami sikoyo mpo ozali kotosa mibeko na biso ya kosalela te. Bo contacter biso na ko cliquer bouton oyo ezali awa na se.

otp_code.title: Tala {{ référence }} na yo.
otp_code.message_email: Koma code oyo etindameli yo na boîte email oyo okomisaki.
otp_code.message_phone: Koma lisusu code oyo ozwi na SMS na numéro ya téléfone oyo okomisaki.
otp_code.warning: Code ekosala lisusu te sima ya 15 minutes

my_works.description: koma moko ya ba partenaires na biso po ozala na makoki ya kobimisa misala na yo oyo ekozala komonana na bato banso. Mpe yango ekopesa yo avantage ya kozua mbongo selon ba consultations publiques.
my_works.terms_link: Svp fina na se pona komona ba conditions na biso.

user.back: Bozongi malamu na Boongo ! Kende kotala politique ya confidentialité na biso, po tango mosusu ebonguani.
